channel.title: Problems with Server
channel.description:
Currently I am using Adel's Server or MetallicScape Server 508. Heres the Problem everything from what i can tell works fine except the Grand exchange. Well sorta the GE works like 90%. Anyway the problem is when you purchase something from the GE and you go to retrieve it from the GE the client logs out? Looked for tuts on here and on the net. Cant find a thing any advice or answears as to why this may be happening?
Thanks in advance hope someone can help with this problem.

item.title: Problems with Server
item.dc:creator: @angels0fdeath01 angels0fdeath01
item.description:
@angels0fdeath01 wrote:

i was thinking about doing that but i wanted to see if anyone had a solution before i went and did it. I was trying to keep it as close to the real thing as possible.

Anyone have an idea to this problem?

Read full topic

item.description:

when you buy it, Why don’t you just have it automatically added to your inventory? Instead of trying to retrieve it?
